src: wʊ̀sá nɪ́ àfɪ̄ā bɪ̀nsá máásé dɔ́ŋá rā.
trs: Wusa is as old as Afia.
He is not able to come.
Couldn't he come?' (declarative: {\sls ʊ̀ wà kɪ́ŋ wàà.})
Perhaps it is going to rain.
No' ({\it lit.} Yes, I am not going)

imt: give {1\pl} all gather go landlord end

trs: Let's all go to the landlord  together.
Don't move in a circle around.
Take this food away! ({\it lit.} take this food and go)
One day a buffalo walked (and greeted the spider) (...)'. [LB 005
Sleeping too much is not good.

src: ǹ gàntàl tʊ́má jáá bàlɪ̀ɛ̀ wā.
trs: I have two siblings younger than me.

trs: It is {\sc beans} he is chewing.'\\
It is to {\sc wa} that he is going.'\\
It is to {\sc wa} that he went.'\\
Nobody saw me.' ({\it lit.} everyone not see me)
I did not see anyone.' ({\it lit.} I not see everyone)
It is {\sc beans} he is chewing.
It is {\sc beans} he chewed yesterday.
It is {\sc beans} he was chewing yesterday.
It is {\sc beans} he will be chewing / will chew.
It is {\sc beans} he will be chewing / will chew tomorrow.
Go back.' (Hearer coming towards speaker, speaker asks addressee to turn and go back.)

src: bàáŋ ɲʊ̃̀ã̀sá káá sìì báŋ̀ nɪ̄ nɪ̏ŋ?
trs: What smoke is rising here like this?'  [PY 059]

src: A: kpá kóŋ à ŋmɛ̀nà díŋ!
trs: Take some kapok and start a fire!

src: A: tʃɪ́á dɪ̀ ɪ̀ tʃɪ́ wááwá ŋmɛ̀nà kéŋ̀.
trs: Tomorrow when you come, ignite like that.
